Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Sonata in A minor after Johann Adam Reincken, BWV 965

no later than c. 1714–1717

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 21' 30"

  • 1. Adagio
  • 2. Fuga
  • 3. Adagio
  • 4. Allemande
  • 5. Courante
  • 6. Sarabande
  • 7. Gigue

This is an arrangement of the first sonata of Johann Adam Reincken’s collection Hortus musicus.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 11 · BA 5088-01 · Bearbeitungen fremder Werke · ed. Karl Heller
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5223 · Klavierbearbeitungen fremder Werke III · ed. Karl Heller
  • Henle · HN 262 · Suiten, Sonaten, Capriccios, Variationen · ed. Georg van Dadelsen
  • Henle · HN 263 · Suiten, Sonaten, Capriccios, Variationen · ed. Georg van Dadelsen
  • Henle · HN 1262 · Suiten, Sonaten, Capriccios, Variationen · ed. Georg van Dadelsen

1. Adagio

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

2. Fuga

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

3. Adagio

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2.5

Difficulty: 2.5
